text: The Bauria railway station serves Bauria, Howrah district, in the Indian state of West Bengal. It is situated on the Howrah–Kharagpur line, at a distance of from the terminus of Howrah Station.Combined suburban Time Table - Eastern Railway, Metro Railway, South Eastern Railway ==History== The Howrah-Kharagpur line was opened in 1900. ==Tracks== The Howrah-Panskura stretch has three lines. ==Electrification== The Howrah-Kharagpur line was electrified in 1967–69. ==References== ==External links== *Trains at Bauria Category:Railway stations in Howrah district Category:Kolkata Suburban Railway stations
title: Bauria railway station
